topic.title: Fascists will find this place sooner rather than later. It's the only serious unhosted solution
topic.body: They can't be deplatformed, but they can be ignored. What's the best option for dealing with them on public zerosites? zites?

topic.title: How do I add blocklists? I can't find the options but the plugin is enabled

1604952415_1AkCd6161a4erMEbe4998aX7Hnpd2.body: You can pay for a custom one from an expert, but that's about it. I assume you're using metasploit with guides. Actually learn shit first.
